overview: "A unit of student soldiers on a diversionary mission for the Battle of Incheon during the Korean War in 1950." -- IMDb.com "Battle of Jangsari is based on a real mission which was kept secret for decades and it mostly draws attention to the plight of student-soldiers who were thrown into battles with little to no combat training and equipment."Sep 15, 2020" -- Wilson Center.org George Eads played Colonel Stephen
title: Battle of Jansari
